last_episode_to_air.name: Wine & Tastings
last_episode_to_air.overview: The crew goes to a win-tasting event at an exclusive club; Noah and Sherm enter a wine-tasting competition while Anthony and Nicky try to get into the “members only” area; Wyatt and Kristen just want some crab cakes.

name: Grand Crew
overview: A group of young L.A. professionals navigate the ups and downs of life and love. When they’re ready to unpack it all, they meet at their favorite local bar for a “wine down.”
tagline: Best friends get better with time.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: A group of friends unpack the ups and downs of life and love at a wine bar.

episodes.name: Wine & Serendipity
episodes.overview: Nicky takes Noah on a self-care journey. Anthony, Sherm and Wyatt deal with the aftermath of seeing each other cry. And there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Fire
episodes.overview: The crew spends the night at Wyatt and Kristen’s house after being displaced by a local wildfire. And there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Therapy
episodes.overview: Wyatt convinces Noah to try therapy. Fay plays matchmaker for Sherm. Anthony helps Nicky navigate the dynamics of a casual hookup. And there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Hip-Hop
episodes.overview: Sherm tags along as Nicky sells a house to a famous rapper. Noah and his date get into a fender bender. Anthony deals with dating while vegan.

episodes.name: Wine & Pie
episodes.overview: Noah's dad is in a funk, so he asks Fay to make his favorite pie. Sherm teaches Anthony to play chess. Wyatt introduces the crew to his brother.

episodes.name: Wine & Headlines
episodes.overview: The crew all do their best to cope after a bad news cycle.

episodes.name: Wine & Wages
episodes.overview: Nicky urges Anthony to explore other job opportunities. Sherm gets Noah into crypto. Fay and Wyatt deal with a bachelorette party. And there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Vineyards
episodes.overview: The crew takes a trip to a Santa Barbara vineyard.

episodes.name: Wine & Art
episodes.overview: Wyatt gets into an art show and asks Sherm to be his subject; Noah doesn't know if Simone is ready to take the next step, but Nicky has a plan; Fay teaches Anthony some dance moves.

episodes.name: Wine & Traffic
episodes.overview: Noah responds to Simone’s marriage proposal, which leads the fellas to go on an adventure; Nicky deals with tension between her and her secret boyfriend, and there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Labels
episodes.overview: Noah tries to find a new normal with Simone; Anthony realizes he doesn’t have a poker face; Sherm starts a risky new business; and there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Neighbors
episodes.overview: The fellas attend a party hosted by Anthony and Sheri’s neighbor; Nicky’s relationship is put to the test; Fay jumps back into the dating scene, and there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Ojai
episodes.overview: The crew takes a trip to Ojai, and there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Children
episodes.overview: Nicky and Noah find out their dad has a new boo; Anthony and Fay look after Wyatt's plants while he's away; Sherm dates a mommy, and there's wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Roasts
episodes.overview: Wyatt doesn't know how to roast, so Sherm agrees to help him; Noah tries to make things right with a disgruntled customer; Nicky dates a sleep talker, and there's wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Honors
episodes.overview: Anthony receives an award from his alma mater; Sherm has an opportunity to meet a renowned businessman; Nicky helps Fay with a yard sale, but they lose something really important, and there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Bachata
episodes.overview: Fay helps Nicky and Anthony cope with a big life change; Noah and Wyatt compete for the change to go to a fancy dinner with Sherm, and there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Journals
episodes.overview: Noah dates a girl who likes to have sex for hours; Nicky finds the house of Anthony’s dreams; Wyatt spends time with his niece, Nadine, and there’s wine.

episodes.name: Wine & Tastings
episodes.overview: The crew goes to a win-tasting event at an exclusive club; Noah and Sherm enter a wine-tasting competition while Anthony and Nicky try to get into the “members only” area; Wyatt and Kristen just want some crab cakes.
